DOC.brief_summary: Aim : To evaluate effectiveness physical therapy intervention technique improvement dyspareunia climacteric woman . Study design : This randomize controlled trial .
DOC.brief_title: Physiotherapy Intervention Climacteric Women With Dyspareunia
DOC.detailed_description: Search location : Menopause Sexuality Clinic department obstetrics Gynecology Clinical Research Center , Hospital de Cl√≠nicas de Porto Alegre ( HCPA ) . Patients participant : The recruited patient may vaginal atrophy ( cytology-hormone test ) must provide diagnosis dyspareunia six month confirm one investigator pain score grade 3 ( visual analog pain scale ) visual inspection , palpation questionnaire duration location pain . Intervention measure : consist evaluation pelvic floor muscle ( Oxford Scale Perfect ) , myoelectric assessment ( Electromyography ) , quality life ( Cervantes Scale ) , sexual function ( FSFI ) , level depression ( Beck Scale ) pain ( visual analog pain scale ) physical therapy intervention . Expected result : To estimate effectiveness pelvic floor training technique physical therapy woman dyspareunia .
DOC.criteria: dyspareunia complaint least six month visual analog scale pain 3 trophic vagina vaginal atrophy neurological disorder lack cognition understand urinary tract infection / genital infection prolapse grade 2 3 severe systemic disease perform physical therapy
